name: UKCoreNHSNumberVerificationStatus
title: UK Core NHS Number Verification Status
description: A ValueSet that identifies the trace status of the NHS number. The CodeSystem is comprised of codes from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary: NHS Number Status Indicator Code. Where the trace status is not available or supported the CodeSystem for NullFlavor must be used instead to allow the sending of an appropriate HL7 NullFlavor value.
purpose: This ValueSet also includes codes from the HL7 NullFlavor CodeSystem to cover use cases where a verification status is not supported.
